enWisdom: The tongue is recalcitrant to its owner
The tongue is a beast of prey, if you let it free it will injure [you]
Be cautious of the tongue for indeed it is an arrow that can miss its mark
Verily your tongue demands from you that which you have made it accustomed to
Your tongue demands from you that which you have made it accustomed to

Wisdom: لِسَانُكَ يَسْتَدْعِيكَ مَا عَوَّدْتَهُ وَنَفْسُكَ تَقْتَضِيكَ مَا أَلِفْتَهُ
enWisdom: Your tongue demands from you that which you have accustomed it to and your soul requires from you that which you have familiarized it with
The affliction of a human being is in his tongue

Wisdom: حَدُّ اللِّسَانِ أَمْضَى مِنْ حَدِّ السِّنَانِ
enWisdom: The edge of the tongue is sharper than the edge of a spearhead
Many an utterance is like a [sharp] sword

Wisdom: رُبَّ حَرْفٍ جَلَبَ حَتْفاً [رُبَّ أَمْنٍ جَلَبَ حَتْفاً]
enWisdom: Many a syllable has brought death
Many a strife has been instigated by a word
Many an utterance is more severe than an assault
Many a tongue destroys a person
Many a war has been started because of a [single] word

Wisdom: قَلَّمَا يُنْصِفُ اللِّسَانُ فِي نَشْرِ قَبِيحٍ أَوْ إِحْسَانٍ
enWisdom: It is very rare for the tongue to remain fair in spreading [news about] the ugly and the good acts [of others]

Wisdom: كُلُّ إِنْسَانٍ مُؤَاخَذٌ [لِنَفْسِهِ‏] بِجِنَايَةِ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
enWisdom: Every person is held accountable for the offence committed by his tongue and his hand
How much blood has been spilt by the mouth!
How many a person has been destroyed by the tongue!
How many a word has taken away a blessing

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ حَرْبٍ جُنِيَتْ مِنْ لَفْظَةٍ
enWisdom: How many a war has been started by a single word
Speech has some banes

Wisdom: مَا مِنْ شَيْ‏ءٍ أَجْلَبُ لِقَلْبِ الْإِنْسَانِ مِنْ لِسَانٍ وَلَا أَخْدَعَ لِلنَّفْسِ مِنْ شَيْطَانٍ
enWisdom: Nothing attracts the heart of a human being more than a [sweet and eloquent] tongue, and none beguiles the soul more than Satan
This tongue is recalcitrant to its owner
